EmailTemplate.name: 202006_APAC_Airlines_APU-I_Webinar_ON24.Sorry We Missed You
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our webcast, APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap? Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}!
Since you couldn’t make our APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap Webcast, it’s now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/tVM2NiDUjCcSS8j81soEJb?]]>, should you like to view it. Please use code 112233.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/tVM2NiDUjCcSS8j81soEJb?]]>
